content.contentDescription: A picture of a natural spring. In the foreground, there is a waterfall flowing from the spring. Moss-covered rocks are visible in the background, behind steam in the air, illuminated by sunlight filtering through the tree canopy above.

sentences: Maria lives in a small village.
Every morning she goes for a walk in the forest next to her house.
She loves the peace and the fresh air.
One day she hears the sound of flowing water.
She follows the sound and discovers a spring.
The water is warm.
“A healing bath!” she thinks.
A healing bath is a natural water pool with warm water.
Many people believe that such water has healing powers.
Maria has an idea.
She could come here and relax.
Maybe she could even invite her friends.
But then she sees something at the bottom of the healing bath.
It is a small, shiny object.
Maria picks it up.
It is an old coin.
Suddenly she hears a voice behind her: “That is my coin!”
Maria turns around and sees an old woman.
The woman looks friendly, but her eyes are sad.
“This healing bath belongs to my family,” says the old woman.
“I lost this coin here many years ago.”
Maria closes her hand around the coin.
She slips it into her pocket and stays quiet.
When she looks up, the old woman is gone.
The next day the spring is silent.
The water is cold and the steam has vanished.
Maria realizes the healing bath no longer trusts her.
Maria feels bad and gives the coin back.
She apologizes to the old woman.
The woman smiles and says the healing bath has a secret.
Only kind hearts can see the spring.
Maria promises to keep the place safe.
The old woman disappears between the trees.
The next day Maria returns with her friends.
They cannot find the healing bath.
Maria smiles, knowing it will welcome her when she visits alone.
